attributes.action: Get our highways litter picked regularly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Driving around England, I am disgusted with the amount of litter strewn into the countryside (plastic bags, cans etc).  This is the case on motorways, A roads and is particularly bad at motorway junctions (i.e. A3/M25). There appears to be no policy to clear this up.  Who is responsible?  Our country is becoming a dustbin.
